name: Anker 7-in-1 USB-C Hub
image_prompt: Anker 7-in-1 USB-C hub, space gray aluminum, slim rectangular design, HDMI and USB ports visible
description: Compact USB-C hub with 4K HDMI, 100W Power Delivery pass-through, 2 USB-A ports, USB-C data port, and SD/microSD card readers. Perfect travel companion for laptops.

reviews.review_text: Essential for my MacBook Air. All the ports I need in one tiny package.
Pass-through charging works great. No dongles needed.
Gets a bit warm under heavy use but works fine.
